Obi Emelonyelisten (help·info) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria. A maara ya maka iduzi ihe nkiri ndị nwetara ihe nrite dịka Last Flight to Abuja (2012), The Mirror Boy (2011), na Onye Ozi (2013).

N'afọ 2020 n'oge ọrịa coronavirus, nke mechiri azụmaahịa n'ụwa niile, Obi Emelonye ghọrọ onye nduzi ihe nkiri mbụ mere ihe nkiri site na Zoom, site n'ịrụ ọrụ ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na London na Lagos
Ihe nkiri ahụ, Heart 2 Heart, nwetara otuto dị egwu site n'aka nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi n'ụwa niile.
Obi Emelonye, onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ na onye na-ahụ gụrụ maka iwu, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka, ebe o nwetara nzere BA (Hons) Theatre Arts degree (1990)
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ maka nzere LLB Law na Mahadum Wolverhampton (1998)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Law Practice na London Metropolitan University (2002) ma rụọ ọrụ iwu ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ọ lekwasị anya n'ịhụnanya mbụ ya, ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2019, Obi Emelonye nwetara asambodo ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ Chartered Management
Ọ bụ onye otu UK Directors Guild nakwa British Film Institute (BFI).
